input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Sunnydaze Decor Slim and Stately Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Vickerman 3' Natural Alpine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7 ft. PowerConnect Dunhill Fir Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='Northlight 18" Two-Tone Mixed Green Pine Artificial Christmas Tree with Burlap Base'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 7ft. North Carolina Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree 931 Bendable Branches'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Flip Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Feel-Real Jersey Fraser Fir Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 2.17-Feet Scotch pine Pre-lit Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights T3402'
  - Name='Puleo International 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Noble Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo 6.5ft Pre-lit Artificial Christmas Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sunnydaze Decor Slim and Stately Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This competitor product is an artificial Christmas tree but described as slim and stately, indicating a different silhouette from the full-bodied Dunhill Fir, making it moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 3' Natural Alpine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: At 3 feet tall and Alpine type, it is much smaller and likely less full-bodied than the 6-foot Dunhill Fir, making it less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7 ft. PowerConnect Dunhill Fir Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This product is a Dunhill Fir tree, same brand, slightly taller and with PowerConnect light technology, so very closely related and highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 18" Two-Tone Mixed Green Pine Artificial Christmas Tree with Burlap Base
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An 18" pine tree with a burlap base is much smaller and different species, so minimally relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 7ft. North Carolina Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree 931 Bendable Branches
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A 7-foot artificial spruce tree with bendable branches is similar in use but different species and possibly construction details, moderately high relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Flip Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: While also a spruce flip tree with a different species, it shares the flip branch construction feature, giving it moderate relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Feel-Real Jersey Fraser Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and fir species, with 'Feel-Real' technology which suggests high-quality construction, making it quite relevant but possibly differing in lighting or branch design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 2.17-Feet Scotch pine Pre-lit Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights T3402
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very small size (2.17 feet) and Scotch pine species make it much less comparable to the 6-foot full-bodied Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Noble Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A 7.5 ft pre-lit noble fir tree is close in height and type of fir, likely full and pre-lit, making it highly relevant.
Similar height and pre-lit construction, but species not specified, so relevant but with some uncertainty.
